title: John Frieda Frizz-Ease 100% Shine Glossing Mist, 3 oz
description: This glosser gives hair a highly reflective, glistening finish. Just a mist revitalizes shine while smoothing flyaways and frizz. Use anywhere, anytime for a flawless finish.
